page.title: 16Poplars Farm Visit 1
page.content: We arrived at the farm and played with the family kitten Tiptoes.We then started the tour of the farm.The farm has poultry and so the first place that we visited was the room where the eggs are sorted.The eggs are put onto cotton reel like rollers,that have a light underneath called the candle.It allows you to see if the eggs have any cracks.This is called Candling.They are then passed onto teeth like things which move along slopes and the teeth let go of the eggs at whichever slope is their size.They are then packed into boxes.Then we saw some Fresian cows,there were 26.After that we went to see some chickens.We saw the fruit growing in the tunnels and we all had a strawberry. Blackberries, rasberies, blackcurrants and tayberries are other fruit grown.Mange-tout beans, french beans and wheat are also grown.
